Name: BrainPower
About the game: Brain Power is a multiplayer battle of words game. You compete with other players and challenge them on their knowledge of the language. GAME FEATURES - relaxing game to play with your friends - Create your own room and secure it with password if you want to play with friends - Create your own game and challenge random players - Define your own categories - Stop button - when you are ready stop the game - Chat wih players - The quickest player who gets most unique words gets the best score!

Meta Description: Looking for information on BrainPower? Check out the release date (Apr 2, 2018), developer insights from Racing Bros, and a complete game summary.
